## GET [/brapi/v1/seasons?year=&pageSize=&page=]

```{r}
library(brapi)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process
con <- ba_connect() 

args(ba_studies_seasons)

json <- ba_studies_seasons(con, rclass = "json")

```

### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
